title: HTTP Server
description: An HTTP server from scratch using TCP primitives, handling GET/POST requests, serving files, and managing concurrent connections

title: DuckDB Extension: Polynomial Learned Indexing
description: An extension to DuckDB implementing polynomial learned indexing via Microsoft's ALEX framework, using ML to boost query performance

title: DNS Server
description: A Domain Name System resolver that handles various record types; capable of parsing, creating, and responding to DNS queries

title: Bug Tracker
description: A MERN-stack web-service offering RESTful API architecture, customizable workflows, and a Postman-tested backend for reliability

title: Remote Dictionary Server
description: A Redis in-memory database from scratch using Java with custom extensions and enhanced features

title: Wellness Score AI
description: An AI-powered wellness score calculator that quantifies health status based on user data

title: Undergrad Thesis
description: A Machine Learning model engineered in Python to predict fake product reviews on Amazon

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: A web-based sorting algorithm visualization tool built in JavaScript

title: Typing Speed Test
description: A canvas crafted in JavaScript to assess words-per-minute (WPM)

title: Personal Website
description: A static web-page designed in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap
